derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from motor, on the pattern of cavalcade

entry.tran: （载有重要人物的）车队，汽车行列
entry.def: A motorcade is a line of slow-moving cars carrying important people, usually as part of a public ceremony.
